message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product at a price of $11,000. I believe this product will be highly beneficial for you and am confident that this is a fair price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product and would like to propose a counteroffer of $9,500.

Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. I understand your perspective, but the value of this product is truly significant.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $10,500. I believe this is a fair compromise.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,000.
